title: Did Dave Ramsey say that he didn't believe in incentive checks because if you needed them, you were "in a mess'state?
subtitle: The host of the radio provided a comment on Fox News, which was inappropriately received by many.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The financial advisor and radio host Dave Ramsey said he "don't believe" in America's incentive checks because if you need money, "I've already been pretty drunk."
